alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 7:30AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Gulf, southeastern Bay and southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 800 AM EST/700 AM CST/... At 730 AM EST/630 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Callaway, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Callaway, Springfield, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Wewahitchka, Allanton, Chipola Cutoff, Overstreet, Davis Beach, Kinard, Broad Branch, Chipola Park and Wetappo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EST/800 AM CST/ for the Panhandle of Florida. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 100 PM EST/noon CST/ for Big Bend of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf
